conbody.p: Eucalyptus 3.4.2 resolves issues listed in the following table.

row.entry: Issue
Description
Walrus DNS does not resolve for all subdomains, only existing buckets
Instance Launcher freezes in case of a large image set and security groups on Eucalyptus
Windows instances failing to migrate with KVM
Scaling group count not resolving part deux
The proxy gets flooded with error messages related to load balancers
Bundle task can block all other operations
Security group description is parsed incorrectly by console
S3 Compatibility: Delete bucket should fail if the bucket contains one or more DeleteMarker(s)
S3 Compatibility: Cannot delete versions when versioning is suspended
NC cannot read /nc/cloudIp from nc_state.xml
NC does not find nc_state.xml on startup if the state directory isn't /var/lib/eucalyptus
Navigating away from the launch instance wizard causes memory leak
Deleted Scaling Group lingers on the landing page for 30+ seconds
Console error messages lack helpful info from CLC
Walrus: Delete object fails with 404 if a DeleteMarker is present
Security Group's detail does not get displayed when it has traffic allowed by another group.
Instance restoration fails for instances w/o kernel and/or ramdisk and/or in SYSTEM mode networking
S3 Compatibility: List objects does not throw error for negative max-keys
S3 Compatibility: List objects response contains MetaData elements
Instance names don't show up on Instances landing page after first log in
"Launch more like this" always launches instance in default s.group
S3 Compatibility: List objects should be exclusive of the object that matches marker
S3 compatibility: Common prefixes are not computed and rendered correctly in list objects response
S3 Compatibility: Last modified date format in copy object response breaks AWS SDK
Images and properties may be lost during HA failover
Cannot open the expanded row on the instance landing page on AWS due to missing image.platform attribute
S3 compatibility: PUT object removes a previous DeleteMarker
S3 compatibility: List object versions does not return the correct values for next-key-marker and next-version-id-marker
NC hangs inside get_blkid (e.g., during launch or migration)
Instances launched by the scaling group do not inherit the tags
AutoScaling Resources Can't Be Controlled by Cloud Admin
httpd-cc_error_log filled with troubleshooting messages causing the log to grow out of control
Cloudwatch Alarms Unable to be Viewed by Cloud Admin
region menu shows when clicking around dashboard
Selecting AZ inputbox is broken in the launch instance wizard
Sort broken when only 1 page of results
Instance public IPs revoked before running.
S3 compatibility: List object versions with prefix and delimiter represents common prefixes differently
NC init script fails to start on Xen
S3 compatibility: List object versions response is missing VersionIdMarker element
S3 compatibility: List object versions should be exclusive of the object that matches key-marker and version-id-marker specified in the request
Proxy should not load all image sets for regions
NC check for virtualization flag is inverted
Sorting instance table by Availability Zone doesn't work
Create instance wizard number validation error if number contains zero
Search for a non-existing image shows "random" results in instance launch and launch config creation dialogs
NC loglevel is set to DEBUG by default
volume auto-fill not working in "create snapshot"
Cannot view sec group expando when group access granted
Firefox gobbles memory when doing normal console tasks
Create volume button does not always work on create new volume dialog
IPs continue to be displayed after release
Displaying help on landing pages resets UI elements
Remove add/remove load balancer feature using the dialog "edit properties" on the scale group landing page
Launch more like this dialog moves every 10 seconds
cannot add unit in create custom metric dialog
Deleted keypairs still shown
Editing Auto Scaling Group Policy in Web UI removes --unit parameter from Alarms
enumerating all images lock up the browser
launch times not displaying correctly
User does not get logged out after leaving console idle for long period of time.
On Launch Config Landing Page, Image Name doesn't get displayed in the expanded row
Register As Image Dialog on the Snapshot Landing Page Does Not Validate Image Name
can't enumerate aws 'all' images
S3 Compatibility: ListBucketResult does not returns canonical ID
Load Balancer VM not able to contact CLC when CC is not collocated with at least 1 Java component
console does not work for Eucalyptus users in "aws" account
console-in dashboard doesn't pick up zone changes
when you click "add another tag" in the manage tags box, the cursor should be placed.
The 'create from snapshot' inputbox in the dialog 'Create volume' is not defaulting to select "None"
Warning text in Launch instance wizard when security group has no rules in missing
DeleteMarker not included in version output of bucket
Tests Cannot attach volume in console (multi-cluster)
white container showing behind instance landing page when help is flipped (on chrome)
Launching instance with name fails to name instance
if i add a name to an instance, i have to click the next button twice in the launch wizard to go to the next section
S3 compatibility: Canned ACL bucket-owner-read results in an incorrect set of grants in the object ACL
S3 compatibility: Canned ACL bucket-owner-full-control results in an incorrect set of grants in the object ACL
Walrus BucketLocation constraint should be empty for default location
S3 compatibility: Objects and buckets with canned ACL (bucket-owner-read) return incorrect ACL
no feedback that the refresh button is doing anything on landing pages
Remove code that uses non-stdlib libs from eucaconsole/__init__.py
account menu and region menu (all menus in the branding bar not collapsing when the user clicks outside of it
resource loading pages all need to display "loading" animation when loading resources
Security group is not displayed on Launch Configuration landing page.
euca-create-keypair show JDBC batch error with a 406 exception
scaling groups landing page needs initial sort set
Required Fields marked for some not required fields in User Console
when no data is available for a table in the expandos a "This <x> has no <y>" message should be displayed instead of an empty table
In SYSTEM mode the metadata is not accessible
Disable button is still clickable on the Attach Volume dialog
tag editing focus traversal not ideal for UX
Associate IP dialog from instance landing page displays the ID of the instance in autocomplete
eucalyptus-cloud fails to start
stopped instances show invalid value for public private DNS names
grep code to look for/remove aliases and test w/ QA
User Console should fail to start if incorrect ssl settings are given
security group description should only be allowed to contain a limited set of characters
httpd-cc_error_log Grows without bound
add CSRF token to login pages
euca-describe-instances doesn't seem to be reporting platform
bucket.create_bucket has strange behaviour when using Walrus
